title: VILLAGE / SHACK DOOR
description: The shack door dialogue, if you have gained access to the shack where you can sleep. It's locked until you get it from the Washerwoman.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm afraid we don't have time for..."
dialogueTree.text: "I'm afraid we don't have time for rest stops right now, officer. We should really get back to the Whirling."

dialogueTree.title: Shack Door: "It's getting cold this late in the..."
dialogueTree.text: It's getting cold this late in the night. Time to call it a day.

links.title: You: ""Good night, Kim." (Send him away f..."
links.text: "Good night, Kim." (Send him away for the night.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good night, officer. We'll meet in..."
links.text: "Good night, officer. We'll meet in front of the shack in the morning."

dialogueTree.title: Shack Door: "The door has seen better days -- th..."
dialogueTree.text: The door has seen better days -- the layer of paint has started to peel off due to the salt and wind from the sea. Even the lock looks slightly rusted.

links.title: You: "Unlock the shack door with the key."
links.text: Unlock the shack door with the key.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll be sleeping in my room in the..."
links.text: "I'll be sleeping in my room in the Whirling. We'll meet in front of the shack in the morning."

links.title: You: ""I'll sleep here then. See you in t..."
links.text: "I'll sleep here then. See you in the morning." (Keep turning the key.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good night." He smiles: "And try n..."
links.text: "Good night." He smiles: "And try not to break the case without me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll wait outside to give you some..."
links.text: "I'll wait outside to give you some time and privacy to check out your new living arrangement. But just so you know..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""After we're done with the day, I'l..."
links.text: "After we're done with the day, I'll still be staying in the Whirling-in-Rags for the night. We'll meet in front of the shack in the morning."

links.title: Shack Door: "The key turns with a satisfying cli..."
links.text: The key turns with a satisfying click. You can enter the shack now.
